tool_description: an api to get you most of the public schools in the US by thier Zipcode
name: US Public Schools API
title: US Public Schools API

api_list.name: Get schools by Zipcode
api_list.description: This endpoint will give you a list of most schools in the specified zipcode.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-public-schools-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/school/75052"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-public-schools-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-public-schools-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/school/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-public-schools-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
